p: Despite the success of antibiotic discovery, infectious diseases are consistently ranked second among causes of death worldwide [ 34]. The pursuit of new compounds that have therapeutic potential for infectious diseases with no existing remedy such as Lassa fever and others focuses mainly on plants as the best reservoir of drug compounds ( Table 1). The microbial resistance to antibiotics is among the significant problems in the twenty-first century and has necessitated the need for a continuous search for more potent and safe therapeutic agents [ 7].
